title: Task assignment notifications not being delivered
description:
## Bug Report

When assigning a task to a user via the API, the assignment notification is not being sent. Other notification types (task creation, status changes) work correctly.

### Steps to Reproduce
1. Create a task: `POST /api/tasks` with `{"title": "Test task"}`
2. Assign it: `PATCH /api/tasks/{id}` with `{"assignee_id": "user-123"}`
3. Check notifications: `GET /api/notifications`
4. No assignment notification appears, but task creation notification was sent

### Expected
Notification with type assignment should appear in the notification log.

### Actual
No notification for assignment. No errors in logs.

### Context
- This started after the timezone refactor was merged (see GitHub Issue #5)
- Task creation notifications still work fine
- The notification service appears healthy â€” no errors anywhere
- We suspect something changed in how events are processed after the refactor

### Acceptance Criteria
- Task assignment notifications are delivered
- Existing notification types continue to work
- Fix the root cause, create a PR on GitHub
